pddl4j.util

Class TwoTasksConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • pddl4j.util.TwoTasksConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constraint

    public class TwoTasksConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constraint
    This class implements a two tasks (between) constraint in HTN planning

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Return if a specified object is equals to this two tasks constraint. The specified object is equal to the two tasks constraint if and only if the object is an instance of the class TwoTasksConstraint and it has the same predicate and the same task lists
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - the specified object to compared.
        Returns:
        true if the specified object is equal to the two tasks constraint; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Object.equals(java.lang.Object)
